column1: A<s>fter not smoking for a while, you need to smoke in order to feel less restless and irritable.</s>

column2: Len : 2    NEED TO SMOKE TO FEEL LESS IRRITABLE
93 = DID NOT USE CIGARETTES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS ..........................................

column1: W<s>hen you don't smoke for a few hours, you start to crave cigarettes.</s>

column2: Len : 2    START TO CRAVE CIGS WHEN DON'T SMOKE FOR FEW HRS
93 = DID NOT USE CIGARETTES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS ..........................................
<s>ou sometimes have strong cravings for a cigarette where it feels like you're in the grip of a force you can't control.</s>
Len : 2    CRAVING OF CIGS LIKE STRONG FORCE CAN'T CONTROL
93 = DID NOT USE CIGARETTES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS ..........................................
